org.spongepowered.api.entity

Interface FallingBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataHolder, Entity, EntityState, Identifiable

    public interface FallingBlock
extends Entity
    Represents a falling block. A falling block may harm entities where it lands, and optionally may place a block, or drop an item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlockState getBlockState()
      Gets the BlockState this falling block is representing.
      boolean getCanDropAsItem()
      Gets whether this falling block can drop as an item if it lands in a way that it can not be placed.
      boolean getCanPlaceAsBlock()
      Gets whether this falling block will try to place itself where it lands.
      double getFallDamagePerBlock()
      Gets the current fall damage per block fallen.
      double getMaxFallDamage()
      Gets the maximum damage this block can deal to another entity for falling on the entity.
      void setBlockState(BlockState blockState)
      Sets the block state for this falling block.
      void setCanDropAsItem(boolean droppable)
      Sets whether this falling block will drop as an item if it lands in a way that it can not be placed.
      void setCanPlaceAsBlock(boolean placeable)
      Sets whether this falling block can be placed as a block when it lands.
      void setFallDamagePerBlock(double damage)
      Sets the fall damage per block.
      void setMaxFallDamage(double damage)
      Sets the maximum damage this block can deal to another entity for falling on the entity.
